{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|Sortable}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class I, class R = ranges::less&lt;&gt;, class P = ranges::identity &gt;
concept bool Sortable =
    Permutable&lt;I&gt; &amp;&amp;
    IndirectStrictWeakOrder&lt;R, ranges::projected&lt;I, P&gt;&gt;;
}}

The {{tt|Sortable}} concept specifies the common requirements of algorithms that permute sequences into ordered sequences (for example, {{ltt|cpp/experimental/ranges/algorithm/sort|ranges::sort}}).
